name: 606060 (60 minutes - 60 seconds - 60 waves: a 1 hour game jam experiment)
name_original: 606060 (60 minutes - 60 seconds - 60 waves: a 1 hour game jam experiment)
description:
Game made in 60 minutes, theme was 60 seconds...Can you reach the 60th wave ?

Grab some bonus and kill'em all.

Arrows to move, mouse to aim and KILL (left click : shoot - right click / space key : bombs)

Game starts with 10 bombs.

Bonus :

Bombs (B)

SlowMotion (T)

Mines (M)

Laser (L)

Double machine gun (D)

Nuke (N)

Now, it's officially beatable ! Good luck, thank you for playing, and keep in touch !
